articles.author: Justin Holbrock
articles.title: Drake reschedules July 1 concert in Columbus - NBC4 WCMH-TV
articles.description: COLUMBUS, Ohio (WCMH) — Drake has rescheduled his July 1 concert in Columbus two months after canceling one of his performances at the Schottenstein Center. The concert has been moved to October 9. Drake last performed in Columbus in 2016, and it is his first…
